attributes.action: request the Queen to dissolve parliament and instruct the people to elect 50 of the best bussiness brains to run the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The way MP,s are pulling the wool over our eyes is unacceptable, the people have no confidence in them regardless of what party, it is therefore time for a radical change before the people take the law into their own hands

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
